channel.title: [PI] runserver java.lang.nullpointer problem when players die? help
channel.description:
[code][25/11/12 2:33 PM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [25/11/12 2:33 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.applyDead(Player Assistant.java:1522) [25/11/12 2:33 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:1505)
[25/11/12 2:33 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:151) [25/11/12 2:33 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:186) [/code] thats my problem and i dont know how to fix :(
